title: How to Clean Cut Glass Tumblers

steps.headline: Squeeze an entire lemon and collect the juice.
Fill a pan with  half full with cold water.
Place a cloth across the base of the pan.
Pour the lemon juice into the pan.
Dip each tumbler into this pan.
steps.description: Just dipping and swishing about will clean and polish the glass.

text: Squeeze an entire lemon and collect the juice.  Fill a pan with  half full with cold water.  Place a cloth across the base of the pan.  Pour the lemon juice into the pan.  Dip each tumbler into this pan. Just dipping and swishing about will clean and polish the glass. Dry with soft linen.
